name: ShooterDefense
description:
You are an alien, that appears in an unknown planet, however your ship requires 5 electronic cards to repair it. Your mission is find all electronic cards to repair the ship.

Be careful you can find more than some electronic cards.

This game is based in the original game design created in the Lima Game Jam 2021. And the original game designers are:

  • Albert Sanchez.
  • Anthony Apaza.
  • Kevin Arena.
